DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Healthy Apple Program San Francisco
DOC.detailed_description: In USA , First Lady Michelle Obama start nationwide child care initiative call 'Let 's Move ! Child Care ' aim improve nutrition physical activity practice child care center promote healthy weight child age 0-5y . The San Francisco Child Care Wellness Collaborative , include San Francisco Department Public Health ( SFDPH ) SF Children 's Council , develop citywide Healthy Apple Program ( HAP ) support local implementation Let 's Move ! initiative . The San Francisco Department Public Health ( SFDH ) exist Child Care Health Program ( CCHP ) provide nurse consultation health education material child care center annual health screening child . The aim analysis see whether child care center offer HAP addition usual CCHP service improve child care center nutrition physical activity practice child weight change well usual CCHP service alone .
